06:00.0 Ethernet controller [0200]: Qualcomm Atheros AR5212/AR5213 Wireless Network Adapter [168c:0013] (rev 01)
        Subsystem: Actiontec Electronics Inc IBM HighRate 11 a/b/g Wireless CardBus Adapter [1668:1026]
        Flags: bus master, medium devsel, latency 168, IRQ 19
        Memory at f1d00000 (32-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=64K]
        Capabilities: [44] Power Management version 2
        Kernel driver in use: ath5k
===ath5k info dump=== 
[41217.736913] ath: EEPROM regdomain: 0x61
[41217.736922] ath: EEPROM indicates we should expect a direct regpair map
[41217.736928] ath: Country alpha2 being used: 00
[41217.736931] ath: Regpair used: 0x61
[41217.737078] ieee80211 phy31: Selected rate control algorithm 'minstrel_ht'
[41217.737409] ath5k: phy31: Atheros AR5212 chip found (MAC: 0x56, PHY: 0x41)
[41217.737411] ath5k: phy31: RF5111 5GHz radio found (0x17)
[41217.737412] ath5k: phy31: RF2111 2GHz radio found (0x23)
